name: include
description: Include certain buttons. Button's order will be as you type it. default: ['facebook', 'twitter', 'linkedin', 'pinterest', 'google', 'stumble', 'reddit', 'whatsapp', 'tumblr', 'telegram']

name: exclude
description: Exclude certain buttons. if defined, these buttons will be excluded, default: [ ]

name: size
description: Button size, accepts positive and negative numbers e.g. -4, 2.5, 1...etc. default: 0

name: url
description: Link to share, default: current URL

name: title
description: Override title meta tag for LinkedIn and Reddit, default: null

name: description
description: Override description meta tag for LinkedIn, WhatsApp, Telegram and Pinterest, default: null

name: image
description: Override image meta tag for Pinterest only, default: null

name: tags
description: Override tags for Tumblr and Twitter, default: null

name: showCount
description: Show share counts on buttons, default: false

name: opened
description: Event emits when share dialog has opened

name: closed
description: Event emits when share dialog has closed

name: count
description: Event emits share count of the share URL
